comments:
I20060328-0010

* Launch a Java application in debug mode (for example, VectorTest)
* Debug to termination
* Select the assocaited main type and rename it (for example, VectorTesting)
* Using the context menu in the debug view, select the debug target and the "Edit Source Lookup..." action
* Exceptions appear in the log:

Should be addressed by fix to bug 114727.

fixed in HEAD

see Launch and AbstractSourceLookupDirector
Note that the new method AbstractSourceLookupDirector#getLaunchManager is an API method.  Unless this is needed, it should be made private or package visible.
Removed the unintentionally new API method.
